ygData.subject: Re: RE: centaur armor Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Trolls can t wear this armor... Medium sized only.
ygData.messageBody:
Trolls can't wear this armor...


Medium sized only.



Sean.Clark@... wrote:
>
> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> Well this armor looks to good to pass up...I guess I will be breaking out my
> Troll warrior....haven't played him in a WHILE :)
> Anybody know if Trolls are KOS by those Centaurs??
> Thanks in advance for the info :)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Diina, David [mailto:DDiina@...]

> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor
>
> From: "Diina, David" <DDiina@...>
>

> that merchant.........
>

>
